code: import{getfeed}from"../../types";export var getPostsAction=function getPostsAction(content){return{type:getfeed,payload:content};};var URL="https://motion.propulsion-home.ch/backend/api/social/posts/";var getPostsFunction=function getPostsFunction(props){return function(dispatch){var token=props.SignInReducer.token;var headers=new Headers({'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)});var config={method:'GET',headers:headers};fetch(URL,config).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){var postsList=data;dispatch(getPostsAction(postsList));});};};export default getPostsFunction;
